law.catch_line: Creel and size limits for fish.

text.section: No person shall take or have in his or her possession in any one (1) day more fish than the creel limit prescribed in the regulation. The regulation shall also provide the possession limit.
No person shall take or have in his or her possession any fish smaller than the size limit prescribed in the regulation.

law.history: Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 65, effective June 19, 1952. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 23. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 27. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 15. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 48. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1893d-9, 1954d-43.
